error_bot_telegram_admin: You need to configure the chatId of the user who will interact with the bot with the TELEGRAM_ADMIN variable
error_bot_telegram_admin_anonymous: You cannot be anonymous to control the bot. In the variable TELEGRAM_ADMIN you have to put your user id.
error_bot_telegram_thread: The variable TELEGRAM_THREAD is the thread within a supergroup, it is a numeric value. It has been set to $1.
error_bot_token: You need to configure the bot token with the TELEGRAM_TOKEN variable
error_hours_between_scans: HOURS_BETWEEN_SCANS variable must be a number greater than 0
error_ip_range: ❌ Error in IP range, should be something like 192.168.1.1-192.168.1.255
error_delete_not_valid_ip: ❌ Please, provide a valid IP. Example: /delete 192.168.1.101
error_rename_invalid_format:
❌ Error renaming device.
Usage: /rename <IP> <name>

Example: `/rename 192.168.1.23 Mom's PC`

The name must not contain {} or "
error_multiple_admin_only_with_group: Multiple administrators can only be specified if used in a group (using the TELEGRAM_GROUP variable)
error_sending_message: Could not send message to $1: $2. Error: [$3]
donate: This project is open source and I do it in my spare time. Donating will not enable any extra features. It is simply an ideal way to say thank you for the work behind a project like this. If you wish to do so, [click here](https://donate.dgongut.com). Thank you very much ❤️
menu:
*🫡 IntruBot at your service*

Available commands:

 · /list Complete list of detected devices.
 · /delete <IP> Delete a detected device.
 · /deleteall Delete all detected devices.
 · /rename <IP> <name> renombra un dispositivo detectado.
 · /version Muestra la versión actual.
 · /donate Donate to the developer.
device_renamed:
✅ *The device has been renamed*

 · IP: `$1`
 · Name: `$2`
known_devices:
📝 Known devices (click on an IP address to copy it):

$1
known_devices_deleted: 🗑️ All known devices have been deleted
user_not_admin:
❌ This bot does not belong to you.

If you want to detect intruders on your network via telegram deploy me on your server.

Take a look at [DockerHub](https://hub.docker.com/r/dgongut/intrubot) where you will find a docker-compose. 

Are you curious? The code is published on [GitHub](https://github.com/dgongut/intrubot).

If you have questions, ask me, I'm @dgongut
version:
⚙️ _Version: $1_
Developed with ❤️ by @dgongut

If you find any bugs or suggestions, contact me.

You can find everything related to this bot at [DockerHub](https://hub.docker.com/r/dgongut/intrubot) or on [GitHub](https://github.com/dgongut/intrubot).
warning_not_admin: User $1 (@$2) is not an administrator and has tried to use the bot.
